bill_title: provide immunity from liability for certain actions of the State Bar and its agents.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to provide immunity from liability for certain actions of the State Bar and its agents. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That chapter 16-17 be amended with a NEW SECTION: The provisions of §§ 47-23-2, 47-23-2.1, and 47-23-27 to 47-23-32, inclusive, apply to the State Bar and its employees, officers, commissioners, committee members, agents, and volunteers. Section 2. That chapter 16-17 be amended with a NEW SECTION: The State Bar, its employees, officers, commissioners, committee members, agents, and volunteers are immune from liability for any good faith act or omission done in the discharge of any duty of the State Bar prescribed by law.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
